init

await Select a branch
snapshot
cmp stdout prompt

# Filter by a string that only matches feat1's worktree path.
feed other-wt
await
snapshot
cmp stdout filter

feed <Enter>

-- home --
/home/user
-- worktree --
/home/user/main
-- branches --
[
  {"branch": "main"},
  {"branch": "feat1", "base": "main", "worktree": "/home/user/other-wt"},
  {"branch": "feat2", "base": "main"}
]
-- prompt --
Select a branch:
┏━■ feat1 [wt: /home/user/other-wt] ◀
┣━□ feat2
main
-- filter --
Select a branch:
feat1 [wt: /home/user/other-wt] ◀
-- want --
feat1
